title: Test API Server Startup and Shutdown
description: Create a test that starts the uvicorn server for api.py using subprocess, sends a GET request to the server using httpx, and then kills the server process.
acceptance_criteria: A test function is created in tests/test_api.py.
The test function starts the uvicorn server for api.py using subprocess.
The test function sends a GET request to http://localhost:8000/ using httpx.
The test function kills the server process.
deliverables: A modified tests/test_api.py file containing the new test.
